mitigation_strategy: Add buffer time to critical path tasks; Weekly progress reviews
Cross-training program; Documentation of tribal knowledge
Formal change control process; Stakeholder sign-off required
Proof of concept for integration points; Vendor support agreements
Monthly cost reviews; Contingency reserve of 15%
Regular security audits; Penetration testing before deployment
Data validation rules; Source data assessment
Alternative vendor identification; Contract penalty clauses
Early stakeholder engagement; Change management plan
Regular team meetings; Clear escalation paths
